param.name: input_file
param.help: If empty, upload or import a SAM/BAM dataset.
param.label: SAM/BAM dataset to generate statistics for

param.name: out_prefix
param.help: Use this remind you what the job was for
param.label: Title for the output file

param.name: deviations
param.help: See Picard documentation: Generate mean, sd and plots by trimming the data down to MEDIAN + DEVIATIONS*MEDIAN_ABSOLUTE_DEVIATION
param.label: Deviations

param.name: histWidth
param.help: Explicitly sets the histogram width option - leave 0 to ignore
param.label: Histogram width

param.name: minPct
param.help: Discard any data categories (out of FR, TANDEM, RF) that have fewer than this percentage of overall reads
param.label: Minimum percentage

param.name: malevel
param.help: Level(s) at which metrics will be accumulated
param.label: Metric Accumulation Level
